name: Urleen
body:
URIín
=====

Another tiny URL generator app
------------------------------

URLín is a small Rails application that generates URLs, like
http://example.com/g6R4x, which you can copy/paste into emails, etc. Like
[TinyURL](http://tinyurl.com), basically. It's only useful if you have a
short domain name.

Installation
------------

It's a [Rails](http://rubyonrails.org) application - see
[these instructions](http://rubyonrails.org/deploy). Alternatively, check out
the Capistrano file in config/deploy.rb, which I use.
tagline: A tiny URL generator web application
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
